name: Lost and found - What if I come and find it
name_original: Lost and found - What if I come and find it
description:
You are one of the precarious employees working for a big company. Your job consists on delivering lost items from clients following crazy notes, all equally hilarious! If you commit any mistakes in the deliveries, it will be deducted from your salary, but don't worry: you will have plenty of time to do your work, from dawn to dusk! Adapt the game difficulty choosing among three levels, which will raise the number of notes you'll have to resolve simultaneously.



Don't forget to take your time to relax at night after a long day of work! You can have fun in a wide range of ways, such as playing basketball or devoting some of your time to capture tiny basement animals to take them to the animal shelter afterwards.



More than half a hundred objects are waiting to be delivered by you at the lost items warehouse!

STRENGTHS

  • 50+ interactive items and notes to resolve using your prodigious intellect.
  • Steam leaderboards with the best employees of the world.
  • Race against the clock with day/night cycles to test your mettle.
  • Basketball (using lost items to practice this sport is not recommended).
  • Rescue little animals and give them a better life.
  • Air conditioner white noise to de-stress.



FUTURE VISION
  • Add many more items (we are looking forward to reading your feedback!)
  • Story mode based on implemented mechanics.
  • Unlockable upgrades spending the few duros you earn in the arcade or story mode.
